headline: Why the Narrative Around Meta Is Shifting Amid Analyst Caution and Bold AI Moves
summary: Meta Platforms stock has recently seen its consensus analyst price target trimmed modestly from $863.20 to $848.43 as Wall Street adopts a slightly more cautious stance on the company’s valuation. At the same time, a small drop in the discount rate and a boost in projected revenue growth indicate that optimism remains about Meta’s ongoing expansion and lowered investment risks. Investors should stay tuned for guidance on how to track evolving analyst sentiment and keep updated as the...

headline: Investing.com’s stocks of the week
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. equities saw a mixed but generally positive week of trading, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq gaining, outpacing the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500, which look set to close slightly higher in the last week.

headline: Big Tech Earnings Reveal Cracks in Case for Massive AI Spending
summary: Results from US technology giants showed that the world’s biggest corporations are still pouring billions into AI infrastructure, cheering investors and bolstering the case for betting on the technology.  Worries over massive outlays at Facebook-parent Meta Platforms Inc. sent the company’s shares on their biggest daily drop in three years.  Microsoft Corp. fell more than 4% in two days after revenue growth in its cloud-computing business failed to impress investors.

content.title: Big Tech Earnings Reveal Cracks in Case for Massive AI Spending
content.summary: Results from US technology giants showed that the world’s biggest corporations are still pouring billions into AI infrastructure, cheering investors and bolstering the case for betting on the technology.  Worries over massive outlays at Facebook-parent Meta Platforms Inc. sent the company’s shares on their biggest daily drop in three years.  Microsoft Corp. fell more than 4% in two days after revenue growth in its cloud-computing business failed to impress investors.
